name: Web Paint
tagline: Paint program that can be run online.
body:
### Welcome to Web Paint Pages.
Web Paint is the simple web based application that gives the possibility to play with the paint program. Wanna play around then please visit the site [here] (http://demo.mlaxman.com.np/paint.html)

### Features of Web Paint
* Draw different shapes *circle*, *line*, *rectangle*
* Perform transformations *rotate*, *scale*
* Create different layers to perform transformation. Transformation will affect only shapes on active layer
* Visibility of layers

### Authors and Contributors
The author of this application is Laxman Maharjan (@lmmrssa).

### Support or Contact
If you feel any feature to be added to this application or any suggestion for it. Then please feel free to contact on [email@mlaxman.com.np] (mailto:email@mlaxman.com.np)
